title: How a Reddit Post Changed my Life

comments.comment: It's inspirational to see a man without legs overcoming the odds and becoming such a talented climber. Bravo, Felix.
Bro is literally collecting gym badges. Love it

Felix: 'I refuse to climb with Magnus'

Magnus next video: 'What happens when a pro climber disguises himself as a coach in Japan'
So adorable when he pulled out his son around 7:04. Such a touching and tender moment. Truly warmed my heart.
dude, this video felt good to watch
bro is just having fun now, nothing stressful. it's really beautiful to know we made the right person famous
As a climber it’s crazy to see you begin a climbing story arc. Looking forward to seeing you bring the gamer brain to the climbing wall more!

Absolutely love that you involve your family WITHOUT being a “family blog channel”. Marzia and Bjorn make appearances, but they aren’t the focus. Thank you for protecting your wife and kid from internet weirdos.

I remember the harassment Marzia got when she needed to get surgery on her nose and people ASSUMED it was for cosmetic reasons.

I'm elderly and I used to watch this boy called PewDiePie. Now I watch a man and father making a quality happy life for himself and his family.  I hope I am still alive to watch the Pewds and Bjorn surfing video. Much love.
Dude finished the main life quest early and it's just doing side quests now.
Omg watching him with Bjorn is so precious

Pewds, I used to watch your YT vids over 10 years ago and (I'll be honest) it's been a while since I sat down and watched one again. I was so into your video game playthroughs, your humor, etc. You always made me smile. Growing up still with a love for video games, I got into fitness myself and now coach others for a living on how to work out safely and hit their goals. When I saw your IG post of you ripped, I was so happy for you. I didn't know you were also climbing along with your usual fitness routine, but I have also been thinking about trying it myself. 

This vid also felt very nostalgic despite it being so different from your content when I was watching you long ago. Happy to see you are healthy and thriving, and congratulations to your new family. Truly happy for you. And I agree, climbing is in so many video games. Level up in a game, but don't forget to level up IRL too! I hope this encourages others to start their fitness journeys/begin climbing!
Bro has completed the main story and is now finishing all the side missions
"I refuse to climb with Magnus unless he apologies for being Norwegian"
Pewdiepie has the most IMMACULATE dad lore

This video got me into bouldering.

Done it twice.

On my second visit to the local gym I took 10 of my friends with me for a group climbing day.

Everyone loved it. I think I am hooked.

I've been a subscriber ever since you had 800 000 subs.

Your videos brightened my days when I was bullied in middle school and now when I'm 26, living on my own, dealing with adult problems you got me into a new sport and it makes me happy.

We don't know each other but I owe quite a bit to you.

Thanks Felix.
My heart melts when he brought Bjorn into the screen
It's not cringe to talk about how happy you felt on a climb it's why we do it to get that moment when we push ourselves to our limit and surpass what we thought we could do
6:15 sharing joy isn’t cringe, Felix. Having community is the best way to live, deadass b
PewDiePie is firmly in his anime power-up phase. Between the art and the bouldering, he's just uping all his stats out here.
As a climber for 10 years, it is crazy to see famous people you've followed your whole life get into climbing/bouldering  glad to see you're enjoying it!
I used to rock climb a lot, and hands down, the community for rock climbing is the best. So encouraging and everyone’s genuinely happy to see people succeed!

I love climbing, so dope to see Felix do it.  for 12:50 there's a saying. "All are equal on slab". You cant just power through it, you gotta be more precise, balance and watch your falls more. Awesome stuff!
Bouldering is definitely not just a hobby but a lifestyle. Totally get your point about the excitement and freedom it brings.

the part where you said you felt awkward when they kept watching you and then cheered for you after your attempts and it made you feel very happy.. when i also started climbing about 2 years ago i went through the same thing and it made me open up more to just interacting with other people. climbing gyms are usually so wholesome and welcoming

Collab with Magnus Midtbø incoming! We want it!
EDIT: Boooyz we got it
It's enjoyable to see your progression and the work for something.
the end part where you said that in the beginning "everyone feels silly" really resonates with pretty much anything, any sport or any game. Really becoming wiser as one gets older.
bro completing side quests
Rock climbing absolutely changed my life. I’ve taken a hiatus from it but I always get the itch cause the community and sport itself is so therapeutic

Seeing you with Bjorn hits my heart strings so hard I've been a bro for about 12 or 13 years and seeing you all grown, having a family, and enjoying life, just makes my day. I love you guys and I wish you all the best

Bouldering is actually the most W sport for introverts - you can just ignore everybody and climb if that's what you want, but then if you actually feel like socializing everyone is super chill and supportive. It's just good vibes all around (plus you get ripped, which is a sick bonus).

The climbing community is the real deal. I'm sure there's more than one exception out there, but I've never had a single stranger in the climbing gym jeer at me while working on a project. It's a space where others want to see your success...sometimes even more than you do in the moment.
PEWDIEPIE gets all the cheering in the world yet a small but genuine cheer from strangers hit harder. IDK why but that wholesome.
You should have played the "Getting Over It" soundtracks and comments on your bouldering attempts! But GUMBALL to you... or whatever they say in Japan!
7:25 yoooooo! Little guy has your facial expressions! There is something about how he moves his brows and how he smiles, that is so much you. Good to see him growing healthy.
I love that hes just doing dad stories like the dad at the party so wholesome to see him living his happiness
I'm so glad you're embracing and expressing your feelings.
Watching your favorite youtuber talk about your favorite sport and hobby really is something else, I'm so glad that you ended up loving bouldering/climbing!
Checking in on Felix's channel just warms my heart. This man has come so far in life, and is a joy to see. Life Is Crazy. Find Love.
Ive been bouldering for 5 months and I love it, its genuinely so fun and the community is amazing
1:00 look at his most recently browsed pages

I’m a mountain biker and I totally understand the kind of camaraderie you’re talking about when people are cheering you on, it’s such an uplifting and rewarding, feeling to get better at something and work on it with other people! Glad you found a sport you love I hope everyone Finds a hobby and passion that fuels them, it is very life-changing
Jesus, Björn is literally one of the cutest babies I’ve ever seen  So glad you found your new passion of rock climbing and that you’re having so much fun in life
Yes dad, I'll try bouldering. Right away.
I've been climbing for close to 8 years now and its wild seeing all these youtubers I've been watching for years now get into the sport, its really cool to see!

Dayum, seeing big youtubers who I looked up to as kid try out my sport is really heartwarming. I also like the social aspect of climbing where you cheer for each other to really push them to the max. Its also good to see that people treated you like a fellow sportsman and not as some special youtuber. cheers
If you collab with me I promise to get you up a V8
i started bouldering after seeing this video, went 3 times in the first week. i already love it!! so much fun to have a full body work out! thanks bro
This was incredible
7:24 i almost started to cry, im so happy for you felix
Felix is too modest for his own good. He is such a pure soul and it makes me happy he has found a sub-community where he can continue to thrive, doing his own thing.
I love how Pewds introduces each video with just saying the word, whether that's "drawing" or "climbing".  It's very simple but surprisingly effective and catchy!
PewDiePie is still going strong gotta respect this man.
When you pull up the baby I cried so hard! Your whole character changed and you’re just full of love. My little one is 11 month now and it’s such a wild ride!
Marzia roasting Felix is the best part of the video
He’s living the life. So proud of you. We now need you to take on a bigger challenge. You know what it is
What a wonferful person. Im so happy for him. Hes doing sidequests!!
Bro Just don't climb a bare mountain without rope for all the gamer's sake

Climbing changed my life too. I was a HUGE gamer growing up and slowly phased out of it. I was in a bad depression rut when my buddy invited me to his climbing club. 15 months later I have climbed every week at least once since then. I am in the best physical shape of my life, and I have become president of said climbing club! It has changed my life for the better and I push myself every day to climb better, andn get more people interested so their lives can grow like mine has!

goddammit i just love u man. didn't watch ur videos 4like 1 year and this pops out and all of a sudden i just started climbing for 5   months now and the journey is great! the people and the enthusiasm they bring towards the field is great! btw I live in north part of Iran and climbing is really kickin here! wish u all the best hope to climb rocks all over the world
Dude that V0 is absolutely nuts. Most people I know would immediately be turned off climbing if that was what was considered "introductory". Guess the Japanese are just built different
i really really love felix's progression video... give me a lot of courage to try a new thing
6:02 so sweet! You can really really feel the love from the community <3
Im loving the financial videos. You have a nice way of explaining things that make it entertaining. Please keep it up!

From one climber to another your grade progression is extremely good. I know plenty of climbers who spend a year just trying to move up one grade. Keep up the strength building Felix, you are killing it!

Not me watching this man go from screaming at amnesia to turning into a whole jojo character. The growth and happiness is something to right home about. Much love to you and your family, you're doing great

3:43
Felix casually did a pullup with "about 500 kilos or something (...)" Simply amazing.
Keep it up Pewds, you're doing great! Always looking forward to more of your content.

When I used to go to a gym (a regular gym) I liked most a gym that was small and there were guys that clearly had been training for years. They would make sure you won't get hurt.. giving good advice be ready when you lift. It was a good time. It is just great to have a "community" that is united by the sport you love.
Why are you such a perfect dad You never cease to amaze, and your moment with your son was so wholesome it's cool to see

It has been YEARS since i watched you play games, amnesia memes etc
Then life happened, got out of touch, rolling my own stuff
I come back to you living in japan, having the cutest baby boy with marzia, and now progression videos and vlogs.
I love it! Also, "Gamba" in my language means bell pepper. Gamba PewDiePie! xD
7:02 you and your little family are so adorable 🥹. Warms my heart seeing this!
I totally understand the feeling when you're cheered on during a climb. I did my first lead climb this week (clipping the rope as you climb) and I wouldn't have finished if I wasn't being cheered on!
i’m gonna cry (happy tears)  7:00
story at 6:00 wasnt cringy at all actually quite wholesome and feel good tbh
Climbing's the best, climbers are the nicest, the atmosphere at the climbing gym is the coolest and the feeling of reaching the top and overcoming your physical and mental boundaries is just amazing
Felix started out the goofy teenage friend we all needed. Now his internets dad who shares life lessons.
As someone that illustrates full time and has also been obsessed with bouldering for years Pewds making videos on art and climbing is making me so stoked. So glad he's enjoying these hobbies!

I’m so stoked you fell in love with this sport!! I’ve been coaching 5-18yo for 4 years and seeing the progression in each person is amazing! The problem solving, the community, the progression, and the self improvement. It’s a wonderful thing
7:05 i literally had tears in my eyes.

I’ve watched your videos for years and years and years since the baby in the bike series and now I check in from time to time and this life update made me so happy and gave me some much needed inspiration to get my life back on track 

Thanks man

I was obsessed with bouldering for the longest time, but after I lost the job I had my parents ragged on me, disconnected my internet until I could get a new job, which I still sadly don’t have. I went to college for animation so for anyone who knows the struggle can understand. But ever since I haven’t had the funds nor encouragement to go back sadly, I miss it, and seeing this video really makes me happy that Pewds is out here living his best life bouldering with the best of them! Rock on Felix!!
This year marks 10 years since I first started watching your videos. It's so heart warming to see where you are now and how far you've come, absolutely love to see it.

"Really Gay Butts"
Felix letting his intrusive thoughts win

I've been subscribed to you for so unbelievably long, over a decade now; I literally have an ill fitting sweater with Happy Wheels and another with "The Bro" and "Stefano" from Amnesia upstairs. I stopped watching as I got older, and when you went to daily minecraft style, more kid-aiming content, but I've always remained subscribed, and kept a loose interest in how your life was going. Now I'm 25, engaged, going through life, and found myself wondering how you have been. This lead me to clicking on a PewDiePie video in my sub box for the first time in ~7 years. Really warms my heart to see how far you've come, Felix, and to see you being so genuine now. I'm really happy for you, and I wish you the best. Chances are nill you read this, but I wanted to leave something heartfelt regardless. When I was a kid, you got me through a lot of rough times with a good laugh, and you inspired me to become a creator myself all those years ago. Thank you for everything you do my man, and I hope you continue to have a great life. Wishing you, Marzia, and your child the best <3
Felix really hit the lifestyle lottery. Love wherever his family wants, do whatever hobbies he wants, and relax. GG
10:37 this is some commendable advertising

I’ve been watching Pewds since 5th grade, I’m 21 years now and I am really love this new era of Pewds as a father and seeing him grow into new interests and sharing these moments with us. Keep on making amazing content Pewds!

"Everyone feels silly" this is the quote to live by! Any time you're feeling silly, nervous, embarrassed, or self conscious... just know; everyone feels these things! It honestly helps a lot in social situations for introverts

I'm so glad you're encouraging people to try climbing. This sport really changed my life. I used to go to my local climbing gym everyday as an outlet. Now I live in a remote part of my country and don't have access to a climbing gym. I really miss the encouraging community, and constant progression. :) thanks for sharing

This is so wholesome Felix. I love that you’re so happy and have a family.
If I’m going to be honest I’ve always liked climbing since I was in the scouts. It’s also awesome that your shredded af now.

This is becoming beyond impressive,let count the skills:
1)Elite physique(started a while back but still impressive)
2)Improving Art
3)Mastering surfing
4) Becoming a great climber
He is doing this while being a supportive husband,dad and friend.Felix has being a force of genuine motivation he provided that if you put enough time and consistency anything is possible.curious what this chad of a human being will pick up next.
5:21 so nice to see the art skill progress
I have recently found out about  climbing from Magnus Midtbø's channel and would love to see a collaboration of pewds and Magnus on bouldering. They really do emit the same vibe.
A collaboration with Adam Ondra and Magnus Midtboe would be a crazy spectacle.
Felix, your growth as a person, and the evolution of your content, honestly, I wholeheartedly, genuinely love it. Thank you so much for sharing!
This man moved to Japan and is already becoming an anime main character.

Mad respect for your climbing journey, Felix! As a bodybuilder, I know that bouldering requires more than just strength—it's about technique, precision, and pushing your own limits, much like lifting. It's awesome to see you share these personal progress stories. Your videos always feel like catching up with an old friend, making us feel like we're part of your adventure. Keep crushing those climbs and sharing your world with us!
pewdiepie magnus mitbo arc (btw please do a vid with him, he can help you out a lot in person)
